title: Sweatpant Jeans Are 2025's Most Controversial (And Comfortable) Denim Trend
description: Level up your casual looks with these cozy-chic picks.
excerpt: Level up your most casual looks with the 18 best sweatpant jeans for spring 2025, including the viral Rag & Bone Miramar sweatpants that look like jeans.

html:
The Fan Favorite

Rag & Bone Miramar Wide Leg Cotton Terry Sweatpant Jeans

Rag & Bone has made variations of its viral Miramar sweatpant jeans for years—and they remain the gold standard to this day—even Sienna Miller is a fan. Printed to look like a pair of faded medium-wash jeans, this wide-leg style feels just right for spring 2025.

The Social Media Star

Gap Heavyweight French Terry Baggy Jeans

Gap’s French terry baggy jeans are another viral favorite. Grab the coordinating sweatpant jean jacket for a comfortable Canadian tuxedo that can easily be dressed up or down.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Polished Pick

DL1961 Hepburn Aura-Denim High-Rise Wide Leg Jeans

Prefer a slightly more polished style? Made with DL1961’s latest fabric innovation, a lightweight cotton-tencel blend, these easy-going baggy jeans are the perfect solution.

A Reliable Plane Outfit

Z Supply Hunter Knit Denim Pant

Available in four denim-inspired washes, these Z Supply pants offer an elevated take on traditional sweatpants. Snag the coordinating button-up overshirt (cut from the same plush French terry material) for the ultimate plane outfit.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Loungewear Upgrade

Good American Jeanius Flare Cotton French Terry Pants

Looking to lean into the loungewear side of the trend? Try Good American’s Jeanius line, made with cozy sweat fleece fabric. Thanks to their denim-like appearance, these pull-on flares will make any lazy day getup look a tad more put-together.

For the Office

Spanx SPANXshape EveryWear Wide Leg Jeans

Spanx designed its SPANXshape denim line for those who want the look of jeans with the feel of workout leggings. This high-rise, wide-leg style features a slightly compressive fit that smooths and flatters, earning praise from reviewers for being both “comfortable and elevated.” It also comes in petite and plus sizes.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Chambray Choice

Quince Pull-On Tencel Chambray Pants

If denim-printed sweatpants still feel a step too far outside of your comfort zone, try a flowy pair of chambray pants instead. This affordable style from Quince is cut from soft, lightweight tencel fabric with an elastic waistband and breezy wide-leg silhouette.

The Pull-On Pant

Frank & Eileen Derry Illusion Pull-On Jeans

If you prefer a straight-leg fit, try these pull-on jeans from Frank & Eileen. The streamlined silhouette is free of pockets, buttons, and zippers, so it’s extra comfortable around the waist. Plus, the cropped length is great for showing off some cute sandals and flats.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Jogger Alternative

Rag & Bone Miramar Terry Jogger Pants

Reviewers say these popular Rag & Bone sweatpant jeans are “truly deceptive,” thanks to a photo-realistic print that includes a faux zip fly, button, and pockets. “They are so much like denim without the constricted feeling and can be worn in so many ways,” one shopper writes.

A Faded Wash

Diesel Relaxed 2078 D-ainty Joggjeans

An elasticized drawstring waistband and faded medium wash bring a laidback vibe to these Diesel Joggjeans. The loose, low-slung fit pairs particularly well with basic tees, tanks, and sweatshirts.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Sporty Style

Lucky Brand Denim Track Pants

These Lucky Brand jeans draw clear inspiration from track pants, with an elasticized drawstring waistband and stripe details down the side. Cut from a super-stretchy cotton and elastomultiester blend, they’ll be your new go-to for casual days.

A Laidback Look

Universal Standard ComfortDenim Drawstring Jean Trouser

Reviewers rave that these Universal Standard Jean Trousers are “perfect for the weekend,” thanks to an elasticized waist and surprisingly stretchy denim fabric.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Drawstring Fit

ME+EM Supersoft Denim Track Pant

These drawstring baggy jeans from ME+EM prove that denim pants can actually be incredibly comfortable. The versatile faded blue wash also make this a pair you'll reach for often.

A Cargo Pant

Good American Jeanius Good Skate Cargo Jeans

Cargo pockets add a utilitarian touch to these Good American sweatpant jeans, which reviewers say are “flattering on and very comfortable for sitting in an office all day.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Vacation-Ready

Bella Dahl Smocked Waist Wide Leg Pants

Cut from breezy tencel fabric with a chambray effect, these drapey Bella Dahl pants work particularly well in warmer weather. The smocked waistband and wide-leg silhouette make them comfortable enough for long plane rides, too.

A Two-in-One Design

The Tales Denim Patched Sweatpants

These patchwork pants from Australian label The Tales offer an entirely different take on the sweatpant jeans trend. Boasting the look of sweats in the front and jeans in the back, they’ll make an interesting addition to any off-duty ensemble.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Next-Gen Sweatpants

Moschino Jeans Urban Trousers

Denim cuffs and back pockets put a modern twist on these classic gray sweatpants. The coordinating sweatshirt features the same denim detailing, should you be eyeing a new sweatsuit.

A Denim Hybrid

Ser.o.ya Chani Knit Denim Pant

Prepare to ring in compliments with these Ser.o.ya knit pants, featuring a contrasting denim waistband and back pockets. For an even more striking look, pair them with the matching knit-denim jacket.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Why Trust ELLE?

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
